title: Microsoft Viva: New module powered by Viva Goals
description:
Microsoft Viva Goals connects employees to your organization's goals, helps them stay aligned at scale, and drives business results to empower people and teams to understand their impact. Use Viva Goals as a standalone web application or directly from inside Teams and our other integrations.
More info: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-viva/goals
GA date: July CY2022
